channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fortune Brainstorm AI San Francisco starts today, with Databricks, OpenAI, Cursor, and more on deck
item.description: Today, Fortune Brainstorm AI starts, and so many key players in AI will be with us live in San Francisco.

item.title: AKQA CEO Baiju Shah explains how the agency is leveraging AI instead of being disrupted by it

item.title: A Customer Complaint Birthed This $50 Billion Network. The Founder’s Glad He Listened
item.description: The customer feedback helped PayNearMe founder Danny Shader recognize he was missing a massive opportunity.

item.title: The workforce is becoming AI-native. Leadership has to evolve
item.description: The new generation began university when ChatGPT launched in 2022 and they now account for roughly half of all ChatGPT usage.

item.title: Netflix needs Warner Bros.’s IP and franchises to remain the default streaming service
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Want to drive the Wienermobile? Oscar Mayer is hiring 12 Hotdoggers for a year-long road adventure

item.title: These power-generating buoys might have just made wave energy viable

item.title: What Wall Street Predicts for the Stock Market in 2026
item.description: Unpacking the S&P 500 outlooks from the biggest banks.

item.title: Citadel’s shot at Andreessen Horowitz points to coming battle over DeFi and U.S. stock trading
item.description: Tokenized stocks are gaining popularity, but a trading giant owned by billionaire Ken Griffin wants to hit the breaks.

item.title: 3 Ways to Fall Asleep Faster, Backed by Decades of Research
item.description: Want to fall asleep faster? Here are three science-backed ways.

item.title: The science of failing up: Why some leaders rise despite repeated screwups
item.description: Inside corporate America’s hidden mechanics that allow executives to fail upward.

item.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang Says His Secret Fear Is Going Bankrupt
item.description: Even billionaire CEOs have deep-seated worries. That’s part of what drives his success.

item.title: The Trump Administration Is Shifting Its Focus From AI to This Burgeoning Industry
item.description: The U.S. government is reportedly ramping up investment in a fast-growing field to better compete with China.
